h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: Further down this left side, avoid falling down the sandy slopes until you reach a rocky area by the very far edge of the lip of this ridgeline. Look carefully, and you can spot the final **Meditation Point** for Chapter 2, granting you a free Spark Skill Point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Sandgate Bound'.
The content is as follows:
Further down this left side, avoid falling down the sandy slopes until you reach a rocky area by the very far edge of the lip of this ridgeline. Look carefully, and you can spot the final **Meditation Point** for Chapter 2, granting you a free Spark Skill Point.
